column4: Question, Im running breezy badger, 5.10 and want to do a clean install of 6.06.  is there an option to format the partition and install 6.06?  thanks in advance
if you have the cd of 6.06, yes
im d/ling the image now, but i noticed its 714mb and cd's are 700mb is the image going to fit?
probably not, i'm surprised it's that big
